results.title: Metformin in Gynecologic Cancers: Opening a New Window for Prevention and Treatment?
results.text_hl: Potential anticancer effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Genital_Neoplasms_Female</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005833 @@@gynecologic malignancies@@@ include inhibition of the PI3K-@GENE_MTOR @GENE_2475 @@@mTOR@@@ pathway, hormone receptor regulation, and reduction of @DISEASE_Fibrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@fibrosis@@@ and @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@.

results.title: Divergent Metabolic Effects of Metformin Merge to Enhance Eicosapentaenoic Acid Metabolism and Inhibit Ovarian Cancer In Vivo
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ is being actively repurposed for the treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Genital_Neoplasms_Female</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005833 @@@gynecologic malignancies@@@ including @DISEASE_Ovarian_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D010051 @@@ovarian cancer@@@.

results.title: Metformin and gynecologic cancers.
results.text_hl: On the basis of these data, centers are currently enrolling for clinical trials using @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ diagnosed with @<m>DISEASE_Genital_Neoplasms_Female</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005833 @@@gynecologic malignancies@@@.

results.title: Old drug, new trick: repurposing metformin for gynecologic cancers?
results.text_hl: Until this question is answered with prospective clinical testing, the role of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in the treatment or prevention of @<m>DISEASE_Genital_Neoplasms_Female</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005833 @@@gynecologic malignancies@@@ remains theoretical and the clinical use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ as a @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@cancer@@@ therapeutic is experimental.

citations.NLM: Febbraro T, Lengyel E, Romero IL. Old drug, new trick: repurposing metformin for gynecologic cancers? Gynecol Oncol. 2014 Dec;135(3):614-21. PMID: 25455733

results.title: The association between metformin therapy and risk of gynecological cancer in patients: Two meta-analyses.
results.journal: Eur J Obstet Gynecol Reprod Biol
results.text_hl: BACKGROUND: Recently, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, first-line drug for @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes@@@, has been reported to treat some @<m>DISEASE_Genital_Neoplasms_Female</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005833 @@@gynecological tumors@@@.

citations.NLM: Wen Q, Zhao Z, Wen J, Zhou J, Wu J, Lei S, Miao Y. The association between metformin therapy and risk of gynecological cancer in patients: Two meta-analyses. Eur J Obstet Gynecol Reprod Biol. 2019 Jun;237():33-41. PMID: 31009857
